title: NullReference exception in SKTextBlobBuilder

comments.author: Gillibald
comments.body: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/master/binding/Binding/SKPaint.cs#L486 is your friend. SKTextBlob is the low level component to store a run of glyphs and only works with SKTextEncoding.GlyphId

comments.author: Gillibald
comments.body: I think https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/master/binding/Binding/SKTextBlob.cs#L53 throws underneath when something goes wrong.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: As @Gillibald says, the text blobs are lower level that works with individual glyphs rather than characters as we know it.

comments.author: ziriax
comments.body:
I'm also having a `NullReferenceException`, but I'm using glyph-ids as returned from `SKPaint`.

I'm using preview 27.

The stack trace is:
```
  at System.Buffer.Memmove(Byte& dest, Byte& src, UInt64 len)
   at System.Buffer.Memmove[T](T& destination, T& source, UInt64 elementCount)
   at System.ReadOnlySpan`1.CopyTo(Span`1 destination)
   at SkiaSharp.SKRunBuffer.SetGlyphs(ReadOnlySpan`1 glyphs)
   at SkiaSharp.SKTextBlobBuilder.AddHorizontalRun(SKPaint font, Single y, ReadOnlySpan`1 glyphs, ReadOnlySpan`1 positions, ReadOnlySpan`1 text, ReadOnlySpan`1 clusters, Nullable`1 bounds)
   at SkiaSharp.SKTextBlobBuilder.AddHorizontalRun(SKPaint font, Single y, UInt16[] glyphs, Single[] positions)
   at SkiaRenderTests.Program.PositionedGlyphRun(RenderTestContext context) in C:\repos\ExpressDev\Source\Research\SkiaRenderTests\SkiaRenderTests\TestText.cs:line 191
```

My code is just:

```
var glyphIds = textPaint.GetGlyphs("X");
var glyphXs = new float[]{0};
using var builder = new SKTextBlobBuilder();
builder.AddHorizontalRun(textPaint, 0, glyphIds, glyphXs);
```

Should I make a new issue for this? I need to manually position glyphs, I don't find another API for this.
